head.title: no-missing-end-of-source-newline
head.description: no-missing-end-of-source-newline Disallow missing end-of-source newlines. Completely empty files are not considered warnings. Options…

body:
#no-missing-end-of-source-newline

Disallow missing end-of-source newlines.

    a { color: pink; }
    \n
/** ↑
 * This newline */

Completely empty files are not considered warnings.

#Options

#true

The following patterns are considered warnings:

a { color: pink; }

The following patterns are not considered warnings:

a { color: pink; }
\n
rawBody:
# no-missing-end-of-source-newline

Disallow missing end-of-source newlines.

```css
    a { color: pink; }
    \n
/** ↑
 * This newline */
```

Completely empty files are not considered warnings.

## Options

### `true`

The following patterns are considered warnings:

```css
a { color: pink; }
```

The following patterns are *not* considered warnings:

```css
a { color: pink; }
\n
```
raw:
---
title: no-missing-end-of-source-newline
---

# no-missing-end-of-source-newline

Disallow missing end-of-source newlines.

```css
    a { color: pink; }
    \n
/** ↑
 * This newline */
```

Completely empty files are not considered warnings.

## Options

### `true`

The following patterns are considered warnings:

```css
a { color: pink; }
```

The following patterns are *not* considered warnings:

```css
a { color: pink; }
\n
```
